newsentry.title: MyCoRe-Developer Meeting
newsentry.message: From 13 to 15 March 2018, the developers will meet in Berlin for the spring conference.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Announcement: DBT 2018
newsentry.message: MyCoRe user and developer will present lectures at the 107th Librarian Day in Berlin.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Update
newsentry.message: MIR and Skeleton are using the current LongTermSupport release version 2017.06.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: Application
newsentry.message: The application „<IntR>²Dok [§]“ of the ViFa-Recht has received the DINI certificate.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen
